description: Sorts a datatable by one or more columns

input.name: columns
input.description:
A map of columns used for sorting.
The datatable will be sorted by  the 1st map item key. The value should be 'asc' or 'desc'.
If there is a 2nd item the dataframe will then be sorted by this

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable sorted by the column(s) specified.
